Class BlackJackServer.Player

java.lang.Object
BlackJackServer.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Enclosing class:
BlackJackServer
public class BlackJackServer.Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
private inner class Player that implements Runnable interface to manage each Player as a thread so that clients can run in parallel

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.net.Socket connection
    socket to establish connection with client
    private java.io.ObjectInputStream input
    input stream that will read a string from client according to the user interaction with the GUI
    private java.io.ObjectOutputStream output
    output stream that will write a hash map with keys indicating the client what to display on the GUI

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Player​(java.net.Socket connection)
    player constructor, it establishes a connection with the servers using the passed in socket, it also starts the streams from the socket

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void closeConnection()
    close connection method to close the socket and streams when the server is turned off
    void run()
    overriden run method that implements the logic of the game.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • connection

      private java.net.Socket connection
      socket to establish connection with client

    • input

      private java.io.ObjectInputStream input
      input stream that will read a string from client according to the user interaction with the GUI

    • output

      private java.io.ObjectOutputStream output
      output stream that will write a hash map with keys indicating the client what to display on the GUI

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player​(java.net.Socket connection)
      player constructor, it establishes a connection with the servers using the passed in socket, it also starts the streams from the socket
      Parameters:
      connection - this socket will be used to connect with the clients

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      overriden run method that implements the logic of the game. This method is constantly trying to read from the client and when it reads in from the input stream it used the read in String to perform a certain operation and then send write a hashmap to the client using the output stream, this map will contain keys with values the client will use to determine what to do. Each key indicates something to do and the values are used to update GUI stats
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable

    • closeConnection

      private void closeConnection()
      close connection method to close the socket and streams when the server is turned off
